modName: FateZero Kiritsugu Time alter Spellcasting shout voice
summary: Replaces shout of Slow Time \"Tiid - Klo - Ul\" with Fate/Zero Kiritsugu Emiya\'s chant \"Time alter Double Accel\"
descriptionHtml:
12/26 UPDATE
Optional file \"Triple Accel\" added
\"\"\"THIS OPTION REQUIRES MAIN FILE\"\"\"
If you have Slow Time 2nd and 3rd words, chant \"Double Accel\" turn into \"Triple Accel\"

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is my first MOD, and first time to make a mod.
And sorry, my English is not good enough.

Kiritsugu Emiya is fictional character of Fate/Zero. 
He use Time Control thaumaturgy \"Time Alter\"
I think Time Alter is little bit like Slow Time shout . So, I wanted to make a MOD like this.

This is really simple.
Just replace shout voice of Slow Time with Kiritsugu\'s chant of Time Alter Double Accel

I made two type of voices, Clear Version and Low Voice Version.
Use either of two voices which you like.

watch the sample video:
http://youtu.be/ZgtIJPd3ViA

---Installation---
Unzip the file and put Data folder into your Skyrim install directory.
***\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\

===This MOD is only for male character. can\'t use for women===

---Uninstall---
Delete the files in skyrim\\Data\\sound\\voice\\skyrim.esm
file name including \"0048ac\"

*For Japanese Users
I also uploaded video to Nico Nico Douga
http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm16530711
author: Sixa
